name: BeerBuddy
0:
”Alexa ask beer buddy to tell me about a random beer”
”Alexa ask beer buddy where I can find a pint in my area”
”Alexa open Beer Buddy”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beer buddy
des:
Offers information on beer, breweries, and events. Beer Buddy will tell you about local beers you can try in your region.

You can ask about the following: 

* for a random beer
* for a beer local to you, and where you can go drink it.


This skill is powered by brewerydb.com.
